description: Kurt is a 25 year old, outgoing stud from the Midwest. He has a fresh, young look packed into a tight and toned frame and is wittingly charming. He studied photography for a while and is now working as an HVAC technician. “I love being able to help people!” says Kurt. “I’m out of the closet and I’m really lucky to have grown up in a place where no one judges me.”
title: Kurt
